verses.text: \w A|strong="H0977"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* favour \w is|strong="H8034"\w* above \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H6298"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* another: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* maker \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w prudent|strong="H6175"\w* \w man|strong="H6175"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* himself: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* simple \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w suffered|strong="H7200"\w* loss.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w humility|strong="H6038"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

Arms \w and|strong="H1870"\w* swords \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w*: \w but|strong="H1992"\w* he \w that|strong="H5315"\w* keepeth \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* departeth \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* proverb: \w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5650"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* ruleth \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* borrower \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* him \w that|strong="H0376"\w* lendeth.

He \w that|strong="H7626"\w* soweth \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w shall|strong="H7626"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* evils, \w and|strong="H7626"\w* \w with|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* \w anger|strong="H5678"\w* he \w shall|strong="H7626"\w* be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w inclined|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* mercy \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* maketh presents \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* purchase victory \w and|strong="H5869"\w* honour: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* carrieth away \w the|strong="H3588"\w* souls \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* receivers.

Cast \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* scoffer, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w contention|strong="H4066"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* quarrels \w and|strong="H3318"\w* reproaches shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0157"\w* \w that|strong="H3820"\w* loveth cleanness \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0157"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0157"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserve|strong="H5341"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* unjust \w are|strong="H5869"\w* overthrown.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* slothful man saith: \w There|strong="H8432"\w* \w is|strong="H0738"\w* \w a|strong="H8432"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* without, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w shall|strong="H7523"\w* be slain \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w woman|strong="H2114"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H6013"\w* \w pit|strong="H7745"\w*: \w he|strong="H8033"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2194"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Folly|strong="H0200"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w bound|strong="H7194"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* \w shall|strong="H7626"\w* drive \w it|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* oppresseth \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* own riches, shall himself \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* one \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H0389"\w* richer, \w and|strong="H6231"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w need|strong="H4270"\w*.

\w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* thy \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*: \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w apply|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* doctrine:

Which shall \w be|strong="H8193"\w* beautiful \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thee, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy bowels, \w and|strong="H8104"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* shall flow \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, wherefore \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H0637"\w* shewn \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w described|strong="H3789"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* thee three manner \w of|strong="H1847"\w* ways, \w in|strong="H3789"\w* thoughts \w and|strong="H1847"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*:

\w That|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* might shew thee \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w certainty|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H0561"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0561"\w* these \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee.

\w Do|strong="H0408"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* violence \w to|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*: \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* oppress \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w* \w in|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H7378"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* afflict \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w friend|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* walk \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* furious \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H6435"\w* thou \w learn|strong="H0502"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w ways|strong="H0734"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* scandal \w to|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w fasten|strong="H8628"\w* down \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* offer themselves sureties \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w debts|strong="H4859"\w*:

\w For|strong="H8478"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* wherewith \w to|strong="H0369"\w* restore, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* cause \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w*, \w that|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* covering \w from|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*?

Pass \w not|strong="H0408"\w* beyond \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* bounds \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H0834"\w*.

Hast thou \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* swift \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*? \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H4399"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w obscure|strong="H2823"\w*.
